title: PS Kwarta Deli Serdang
text: Persatuan Sepakbola Kwarta Deli Serdang is an Indonesian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Medan">Medan</a>, <a href="North%20Sumatra">North Sumatra</a>. They play in <a href="Liga%203%20%28Indonesia%29">Liga 3</a>. Their home ground is Pardedetex Stadium.
